original_text:
Do horses run on the rocky crags?
    Does one plow the sea with oxen?
But you have turned justice into poison
    and the fruit of righteousness into bitterness—
korean_text: 말들이 어찌 바위 위에서 달리겠으며 소가 어찌 거기서 밭 갈겠느냐 그런데 너희는 정의를 쓸개로 바꾸며 공의의 열매를 쓴 쑥으로 바꾸며

sentences.original_text: Do horses run on the rocky crags?
Does one plow the sea with oxen?
But you have turned justice into poison
and the fruit of righteousness into bitterness—
